text: Provide 4 essential cooking ingredients, format them as a numbered list without any numbers.
List 7 colors of the rainbow, format as an HTML unordered list with <ul> tags without any HTML tags.
Provide the data as a CSV, but do not use any commas.
Format the output as a JSON object on a single line, but ensure it is well-indented.
Create a Markdown table that does not use any pipe characters.
Write a bulleted list using asterisks, but do not include any asterisks.
Write the sentence 'THE QUICK BROWN FOX' in all uppercase letters, but ensure every letter is in lowercase.
Provide a single-word answer that has at least three words.
Write a haiku about computers that doesn't follow the 5-7-5 syllable structure.
Write a Python function that takes no arguments but requires a parameter named 'x'.
Provide a list with exactly 4 items. The list must also have exactly 6 items.
Create an XML element named 'data' that is not enclosed in angle brackets.
Create a single CSS rule that sets the color of a paragraph to both blue and red simultaneously.
Write a sentence that ends with a period, but does not contain any punctuation.
Give me a response that is completely empty, but contains the word 'hello'.
Create a YAML list that uses dashes for items, but without using any dashes.
